test.name: net.shipilev.concurrent.torture.tests.init.arrays.ByteArrayInitTest
test.description: Tests if byte[] has the proper default values.

case.description: Seeing the null array. This is legal case since there is a race between actor and observer. Seeing the default value for long field. The update to the field in the constructor is lost.
Seeing the completely initialized array, and all elements are with default values.
Seeing some values in the array is NOT default value.
